name: Transcendence Legacy Interlude
description:
"...will you... fight for me once again?..."

Transcendence Legacy Interlude is a short JRPG taking place after the events of Transcendence Legacy. The four main casts, being controlled by a greater force, are tasked to slay a certain divine entity named Tempos. Yet all of this is only the beginning of a greater event.

This game features a classic turn-based battle mechanics with a front-view perspective, linear character progression, recurring characters from Transcendence Legacy, 4 dungeons/areas, and has an estimated playtime of 1-2 hours.
